channel.title: Articles on Fajrin Nugraha
channel.description: Recent content in Articles on Fajrin Nugraha

item.title: Buy Me a Coffee, Feed My Creativity
item.description: Hey there! If you’ve stumbled upon my portfolio website and you’re feeling particularly generous, I wouldn’t say no to a donation for a cup of coffee! You see, I’m a writer, and my brain runs on caffeine. Without it, I’m basically a zombie with a keyboard. But really, any amount would be greatly appreciated. Even if it’s just enough for a sip of coffee, I’ll still be over the moon. And who knows, maybe that sip will be enough to spark a brilliant idea for my next article or project.

item.title: Ensuring Quality and Compliance
item.description: As a Quality Control Intern at Murinda, I had the opportunity to participate in projects for JGC Indonesia and Mitsui E&S. In this role, I contributed to the quality control process and ensured compliance with project specifications. This allowed me to develop valuable skills in quality control and project management. During my time at Murinda, I assisted in inspecting and testing products to ensure compliance with quality standards. This gave me hands-on experience with quality control procedures and principles, which I learned and applied in a practical environment.
